tours.title: Desert Safari with Bab Al Shams Dinner Live Music and Live Singing
tours.description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Desert Safari and Bab Al Shams Dinner experience!
tours.title2: Desert Safari with Bab Al Shams Dinner Live Music and Live Singing
tours.description2: Embark on a remarkable journey with our Desert Safari and Bab Al Shams Dinner experience! Your adventure begins with convenient pickup in a comfortable 4x4 vehicle. Experience the adrenaline rush of dune bashing and the fun of sandboarding as you navigate the golden desert dunes. Pause to capture unforgettable moments during a photo stop against the stunning desert backdrop. As the day transitions to night, indulge in a sumptuous dinner at the luxurious Bab Al Shams resort, accompanied by enchanting live entertainment that will captivate your senses. This perfect blend of adventure and elegance awaits—book your experience today!

inclusions.pickup_and_dropoff: Pick up and drop off from your hotel, apartment, or residence in Dubai using a 4x4 Toyota Land Cruiser.
inclusions.dune_bashing: Professional dune bashing experience with a licensed desert safari driver.
inclusions.desert_photography: Opportunity for stunning photography of the beautiful desert scenery.
inclusions.traditional_welcome: Traditional welcome at Bab Al Shams with Arabic sweets and fresh fruits.
inclusions.refreshments: Soft drinks and cold water available throughout the evening.
inclusions.buffet_dinner: International buffet dinner with BBQ, including vegetarian and non-vegetarian options.
inclusions.light_and_sound_show: Full stage and camp-wide light and sound display.
inclusions.belly_dance_show: Two captivating live belly dance performances with traditional Arabic music.
inclusions.licensed_drivers: All safari drivers hold UAE government-issued licenses.
inclusions.vehicle_safety: All vehicles are fully insured and meet UAE safety regulations.

tours.title: Abu Dhabi Tour with Qasr Al Watan | Abu Dhabi Sightseeing
tours.description: Discover Abu Dhabi's grandeur with a personalized tour that includes Qasr Al Watan and more.
tours.title2: Abu Dhabi Tour with Qasr Al Watan | Abu Dhabi Sightseeing
tours.description2: Experience the cultural soul and modern marvels of the UAE capital on this guided Abu Dhabi city tour. Start your journey in a private, air-conditioned vehicle with an expert guide offering fascinating insights at every stop. Visit iconic landmarks including the majestic Qasr Al Watan – the Palace of the Nation – where intricate architecture and historical exhibits await. Capture the city's skyline, stroll along the scenic Corniche, and explore a blend of heritage and innovation. Designed for comfort and discovery, this full-day tour is perfect for families and first-time visitors alike.

inclusions.private_transport: Pick-up and drop-off in a private, air-conditioned vehicle from your hotel or home in Dubai.
inclusions.guided_tour: Professional English-speaking guide offering in-depth commentary throughout the journey.
inclusions.qasr_al_watan_entry: Entrance to Qasr Al Watan – explore the Presidential Palace, its exhibitions, and architectural splendor.
inclusions.custom_FAQs: Flexible FAQs tailored to your group's interests and pace.
inclusions.vehicle_wifi: Free WiFi available in the vehicle for added convenience.

additional_info.note: This tour is ideal for families, solo travelers, and small groups seeking a comfortable, culturally rich Abu Dhabi experience. Guests are advised to wear respectful clothing for mosque or palace entries.
